Articles.Content:
This is an aircraft I made. It is a regional Aircraft with Modular Fuel Tanks. Oh, and i gave it a droop nose because Why not?

IMAGES: https://imgur.com/juywCwo https://imgur.com/KMEZkqe

Info:

Base, No tanks: Take off: <50 mps. Fuel: 600 Units

Tanks Attached: Take off <65 mps. Fuel 1200 Units

Download: https://kerbalx.com/HamnavoePer/Crne-458-Regional-Jet (BASE) https://kerbalx.com/HamnavoePer/Crne-458-Regional-Jet-Long-Range (TANKS ATTACHED)
